gift_card_txt: For the first time in almost 40 years, we will be closing for the foreseeable future during our state’s mandatory shutdown. We thank you for the immeasurable kindness and generosity you have shown us leading to this point. As we navigate this uncharted territory, we ask for continued support and love for our staff, friends, families, vendors, and Boston community during this difficult time. We look forward to reopening our doors and welcoming each of you back to Grill 23, stronger and better than before. Want to help? 50% of all gift card purchases will be donated to the HHG staff relief fund. Click here to purchase!
